mapper.sql: PMR_SERNO, COVER_SERNO, LIST_SERNO, CONT_NO, COVER_START_DATE, COVER_END_DATE, COVER_AMOUNT, AMOUNT, TERM, MODF_DATE, MODF_AMOUNT, POL_START_DATE, UP_US_ID, UP_BR_ID, UP_TIME, IQP_LOAN_SERNO, COVERAGE_FEE, MODF_COVERAGE_FEE, COVER_CREATE_STATUS, MODF_COVER_CREATE_STATUS, EFFECT_STATUS, ENDORSEMENT_SERNO, PK_ID_ORIG, PK_ID_CURR, RATE_ORIG, RATE_CURR, EXCUSE_RATE_ORIG, EXCUSE_RATE_CURR, C_APPNT_ORIG, C_APPNT_CURR, COVER_AMOUNT_DIFF, COVERAGE_FEE_DIFF, ENDORSEMENT_REASON, ENDORSEMENT_CONTENT, BIZ_MODE, RECEIVE_CUS_NAME, RECEIVER_CUS_ID, BELONG_BR_ID, PRD_ID, PRD_NAME, APPLY_USER_ID, APPLY_DATE, CUS_TYPE, LSTIQP_SERNO, FOREIGN_KEY, CHECK_USER_ID, CHECK_TIME, MOD_TYPE, INPUT_BR_ID, APPROVE_STATUS, MODF_CONT_NO, NEW_AMOUNT, MODF_RECEIVE_CUS_NAME, CUS_NAME, MODF_CUS_NAME, CORE_APP_SERNO, CERT_CODE, MODF_CERT_CODE, INDIV_SEX, MODF_INDIV_SEX, MOBILE, MODF_MOBILE, ADDRESS, MODF_ADDRESS, RECEIVE_CUS_CERT_CODE, MODF_RECEIVE_CUS_CERT_CODE, RECEIVE_CUS_PHONE, MODF_RECEIVE_CUS_PHONE, RECEIVE_CUS_CERT_TYPE, MODF_RECEIVE_CUS_CERT_TYPE, RECEIVER_CUS_ADDRESS, MODF_RECEIVER_CUS_ADDRESS, LEGAL_NAME, MODF_LEGAL_NAME, LEGAL_CERT_CODE, MODF_LEGAL_CERT_CODE, MODF_LEGAL_HOME_ADDR, INSURANCE_TYPE, MODF_INSURANCE_TYPE, LEGAL_HOME_ADDR, C_UNIVERSITY_ADD, C_UNIVERSITY_NAME, C_DEPARTMENT_NAME, C_CLASS_NAME, C_TGT_FLD8, N_TGT_FLD3_FLD8, C_PCUR_CNM, PERSON_COUNT, MODF_C_UNIVERSITY_ADD, MODF_C_UNIVERSITY_NAME, MODF_C_DEPARTMENT_NAME, MODF_C_CLASS_NAME, MODF_PERSON_COUNT, MODF_C_PCUR_CNM, MODF_C_TGT_FLD8, MODF_COVER_END_DATE, N_TGT_FLD3, RESOLVE_WAY, MODF_RESOLVE_WAY, ACCOUNT_NAME, ACCOUNT_NO, PAYEE_BANK_CITY_CODE, PAYEE_BANK_CITY, PAYEE_BANK_CODE, PAYEE_BANK_NAME, BANK_CODE, BANK_BRANCH_NAME, MODF_N_TGT_FLD3, ENDOR_NO, BILL_NO, MODF_BILL_NO, PUB_BANKS_URID, LOSS_TYPE, PUB_STANDARDAREAS_URID, CLA, BANK_PAY_TYPE, PAYEE_TYPE, FEE_DESCRIPTION, PAYEE, HA_APPROVE_STATUS, HA_APPROVE_TIME, HA_APPROVE_USER, HA_APPROVE_REMARK, HA_RECEIPTS_PAYMENT_NUMBER, SURREND_REASON
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT P.LIST_SERNO, P.MOD_TYPE, P.APPROVE_STATUS, P.ENDORSEMENT_CONTENT FROM POLICY_MODIFY_RECORD P WHERE P.LIST_SERNO = #{listSerno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND P.MOD_TYPE = '01' AND P.APPROVE_STATUS IN (997,998) ORDER BY P.APPLY_DATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.insert:
select 'LS'||to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd')||ACC_DETAIL_SEQ.nextval from dual
